footer.discoverPower: Discover how the power of data can transform Ivorian football.

home.heroTitle: Welcome to IDA, Intelligence Data Analytics
home.heroSubtitle: We are redefining the future of football in Côte d'Ivoire through the exploitation of advanced sports data.
home.briefSubtitle: Our project focuses on the collection and analysis of precise and detailed data, directly from matches.
home.tech1Content: We use the latest AI camera technologies to capture every moment of the game, enabling in-depth analysis of player and team performances. These innovative tools offer a unique overview, capturing angles impossible to obtain by traditional means.
home.tech2Content: Our teams of experts transform this data into actionable information, offering clubs, coaches, and agents precise insights to improve game strategies, optimize player performance, and identify promising talent.
home.tech3Content: Whether you're a club looking for a competitive edge, an agent wanting to spot the next great talent, or a football enthusiast eager to understand the game from a new angle,
home.tech3Footer: Discover how the power of data can transform Ivorian football.
home.whatIsSubtitle: IDA is an innovative project dedicated to the collection, analysis, and exploitation of sports data in Côte d'Ivoire, mainly in football
home.visionTitle: A Vision to Transform Football in Côte d'Ivoire
home.visionSubtitle: Together, we share a common vision: to elevate football in Côte d'Ivoire to a new level through innovation and data.
home.title: We have super Packs for you
home.subtitle: We offer tailored services based on your specific needs.

basic.feature1: Database Access: View Player Profiles & Match Results
basic.feature2: Basic Statistics: View standard stats (Goals, Assists, Cards, Appearances)
basic.feature3: Search Engine: Filter players by Name, Team, Nationality, or Position
basic.feature4: Player Highlights: Watch short highlight clips of individual players

pro.feature2: Full Match Video Streaming: Watch complete 90-minute match replays
pro.feature3: Advanced Statistics: Access deep data (xG, Key Passes, Possession %, Duels Won, Heatmaps)
pro.feature4: Comparison Tools: Side-by-side comparison of Players and Teams
pro.feature5: Advanced Filtering: Find players based on performance metrics

partner.feature2: Commercial Data License: Right to use platform data/videos in official club scouting reports
partner.feature3: Priority Scouting Requests: Specific matches filmed/uploaded first
partner.feature4: Manual Data Export: Admin provides Excel/CSV exports upon request
partner.feature5: Dedicated Account Manager: Direct WhatsApp/Phone access to admin team

dashboard.statisticsSubtitle: Boost your game with stats and goals tailored to you
dashboard.premiumAccessSubtitle: You now have access to the M3 Dashboard
dashboard.premiumAccessDescription: Your premium subscription includes full access to our advanced M3 Dashboard with powerful analytics, enhanced features, and professional management tools.
